articles.author: Alfredo Ortiz
articles.title: Alfredo Ortiz: The tax-cut boom — Trump and GOP were right, Democrats and media flat out wrong
articles.description: Tax cuts have helped small businesses and ordinary Americans just like Republicans and conservative commentators claimed at the time.
articles.content:
This week marks the second anniversary of President Trump's tax cuts, and their results are a vindication of Trump and his Republican colleagues who passed them over hysterical liberal opposition.
Before they passed, Speaker Nancy Pelosi called the tax cuts … [+4674 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: NORAD to track Santa for 64th year - with a little help from Big Tech
articles.description: It takes a village of dozens of tech firms — including Google, Microsoft, Hewlett Packard and Bing Maps — to deliver the immersive effect for global Santa trackers, with some 15 million visits to the website alone last year.
articles.content:
Depending on which country they’re from, the kids may ask about Father Christmas, Papa Noel, Saint Nick or Santa Claus.
But they all want to know one thing: where in the world the jolly old man and his sleigh full of gifts are on Christmas Eve.
For the 64th… [+3315 chars]

articles.author: Yael Eckstein
articles.title: Yael Eckstein: On Hanukkah, I pray for people of all faiths who are oppressed
articles.description: Each Hanukkah, I often have it in my heart to pray for and to act on behalf of those who suffer persecution for their own faith.
articles.content:
Hanukkah, which began Sunday night this year, commemorates a great Jewish victory over oppression by the Syrian Greeks in 164 B.C.
The Greek king of the Seleucid Empire, Antiochus Epiphanes, imposed a heavy hand against the Jews in the land of Israel, forbid… [+3490 chars]
